title: The Pageant Tarot
description: A dramatic reinterpretation of the tarot where archetypes take the stage. Each card captures a performance—a frozen moment of divine theatre that honors tradition while teasing new emotional truths.
pitch: What if each tarot card was not a character—but an actor caught mid-performance? The Pageant Tarot invites you to witness the archetypes, not as frozen icons, but as living, breathing roles on the grand stage of the soul.
challenge: Capturing both the symbolic gravity and performative tension of the archetypes in a single still frame—where story, intention, and myth must all co-exist.
development: Each image began with study—of traditional tarot meaning, of gesture and theatricality, of costume and silhouette. From there, I sculpted tableaux that vibrate with story, letting each archetype act through light, gaze, and posture.
outcome: The Pageant Tarot becomes both a deck and a gallery—a performance in 78 acts, inviting viewers to interpret not just meaning, but motion, tension, and character. A tarot for the visual poet, the reader, and the audience within.

gallery.title: The Lovers
gallery.description: Two become one—but not by merging. This is a choice, a tension, a sacred kiss under hot lights.

hotspots.title: Dual Gaze
hotspots.description: Both figures look not at each other but forward—toward fate, suggesting unity as shared direction, not surrender.

hotspots.title: Mirrored Hands
hotspots.description: Their fingers do not intertwine—they echo. Love as parallel, not possession.

gallery.title: The Fool
gallery.description: A moment before flight. Not ignorance—innocence. Not risk—ritual.

hotspots.title: Raised Heel
hotspots.description: The gesture of a dancer’s leap, frozen. Suggests potential, motion, and sacred play.

gallery.title: The Hermit
gallery.description: Alone but not lost. A guide withdrawing, carrying the flame inward.

hotspots.title: Lantern Glow
hotspots.description: Held low, the light casts upward—revealing the seeker as both source and subject.

gallery.title: The Chariot
gallery.description: Tension in symmetry. Not speed, but sacred control of opposition.

hotspots.title: Arm Tension
hotspots.description: Each side of the body pushes and pulls—a performance of balance, not brute force.

gallery.title: The Emperor
gallery.description: Stillness as command. Authority rendered in posture, not voice.

hotspots.title: Upright Spine
hotspots.description: Power that does not move. The ruler remains, and thus rules.

gallery.title: The Hanged Man
gallery.description: Suspension as insight. The body twisted—but the gaze, serene.

hotspots.title: Inverted Calm
hotspots.description: Though upside down, the figure shows no strain—suggesting surrender as strength.

gallery.title: The Hierophant
gallery.description: Ritual and hierarchy. A performance of tradition, cloaked in robes of order.

hotspots.title: Raised Hand
hotspots.description: The classic blessing mudra—gesture becomes liturgy.

gallery.title: The High Priestess
gallery.description: Stillness, mystery, moonlight on velvet. She knows—but says nothing.

hotspots.title: Veiled Curtain
hotspots.description: The threshold behind her glows—a portal, not yet passed.

gallery.title: Strength
gallery.description: Not domination—devotion. The lion does not struggle. Neither does she.

hotspots.title: Touch Without Force
hotspots.description: Her hand does not grip—it blesses. Strength as calm authority.

journey.title: Stage as Symbol
journey.description: Each card imagined as a sacred stage—the archetype mid-performance.

journey.title: Gesture as Meaning
journey.description: Studied hand positions, posture, and symmetry as symbolic language.

journey.title: Light as Revelation
journey.description: Lighting was treated not as aesthetics, but as metaphysical metaphor.

specs.title: Archetype as Performance
specs.description: Each card captures the energy of the archetype as an actor in mid-role.

specs.title: Symbol-Driven Composition
specs.description: Gestures, props, lighting—all chosen to embody the card’s core tension.

specs.title: Staged Stillness
specs.description: Each image is a dramatic pause—a breath between becoming and being.
